front.title: A Protocol for Remotely Managing Sieve Scripts

abstract.t: Sieve scripts allow users to filter incoming email. Message storesare commonly sealed servers so users cannot log into them, yet usersmust be able to update their scripts on them. This documentdescribes a protocol "ManageSieve" for securely managing Sievescripts on a remote server. This protocol allows a user to havemultiple scripts, and also alerts a user to syntactically flawedscripts.
